author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Railway Protection Force of Chennai Division has arrested 9 persons in the city and Vellore on charges of using fake identity cards to buy e-tickets so far this month.

Different teams launched a drive against touts using fake identity cards following a tip-off, an official release said.

The raids began with checks at a travel agency on March 13 on Arcot Road in Vellore. Six e-tickets purchased through Tatkal were seized. Similar raids were conducted at shops in Villivakkam, Chromepet, Egmore and Periamet in Chennai and another travel agency’s office in Vellore, the release said.

Computer accessories, tickets booked using fake identity cards and a sum of Rs. 77,000 were recovered.
title: 9 held for booking tickets with fake ID cards
